title: Is making BBQS an essential job? LA county
text: I apologize if this is the wrong sub. My boyfriend works for a business in la county with 100-150+ employees that manufactures BBQS and fire pits. On 3/20 they announced that they would be closing for 4 weeks due to the corona but they cut it a week short and are requiring everyone to start working as of yesterday. Is this considered an essential job?
